name: Nello Pagani
introduction: Cirillo "Nello" Pagani (born 11 October 1911 and died 19 October 2003) was an Italian motorcycle racer and Formula One driver. He raced in the 1950 Swiss Grand Prix in a Maserati that had been entered for Jos Froiln Gonzlez, who was injured and did not participate. He also raced in 23 non-championship races between 1946 and 1953, winning the Pau Grand Prix twice.
